title: St. Luke's United Methodist Church | Current Home
text: - Welcome - Worship - Grow & Serve - Give - Preschool St. Luke's United Methodist Church Vision Statement As followers of Jesus Christ transformed by God's love, we embrace all people and connect through joyful worship and fellowship as we grow in faith and serve in partnership with our community and the world. Fellowship With Us Come and see what makes St. Luke's United Methodist Church such a loving family. We want to get to know you better and serve you in any way possible! - 9:15 AM - A traditional service offered in-person, live streaming on our website, Facebook Live, and YouTube.
